Reviews.Title: Easy to grip style!  The LG T375 allows me to keep work and personal calls separated ON ONE HANDSET
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: The LG T375 is a dual SIM phone with a 3.2-inch capacitive LCD color display, 2-megapixel camera, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, FM radio and multimedia player.This phone has an easy to grip style - with rounded edges and measuring 4.06 x 2.32 inches and just 0.42 inches thick, it fits perfectly in my hand.WHY BUY A DUAL SIM PHONE?You can operate two phone numbers on one handset - from the same service provider or different service providers.By putting both SIM cards in the LG T375 handset, it's like having two phones in one. (REMEMBER: Both your SIM cards can be on the same network/service provider or on two different networks)The LG T375 allows me to switch networks flawlessly without having to switch my SIM card - and with two different numbers it's easy to keep work and personal calls separated ON ONE HANDSET!PROS:The LG T375 has 50 MB internal storage and a micro SD card slot (up to 16 GB)Capacitive multitouch screen is very responsive128 MB ROM and 64 MB RAM is more than adequate for basic phone functionsThe phones offer GSM/EDGE connectivity along with Wi-Fi. You also get Facebook and Twitter integration (I haven't used these social media features though)According to the Users' Manual, the standard 950mAh Li-Ion battery allows up to 528 hours of Stand-by and up to 14 h 40 min of Stand by time. With normal use, I usually charge my phone every 3 days.Like most phones, you need the headphones Stereo to operate the FM radio but the LG T375 allows FM recording.  I use this feature to make personalized ringtones :))Pairing devices using the LG T375 Bluetooth is easy.  So far I have used the Bluetooth to pair the LG T375 with a Sony VAIO E15 Laptop,  a Motorola T325 Bluetooth Portable Car Speaker and a Samsung C3222 Ch@t Dual SIM PhoneCONS:The LG T375 is a budget phone so, the processor is understandably slow.The LG T375 connects via EDGE, GPRS - so, slow data means slow Internet browsing.The screen lacks an ambient light sensor for automatic screen brightness adjustment - it's a bit of a challenge to see the display in bright sunlight.The screen display is low resolution (240 x 320 pixels) with a pixel density screen of 125ppi.  This is only noticeable if I am doing a lot of Internet browsing.The camera is just 2.0 MP and it lacks autofocus and also no flash. These is fine if you use the LG T375  phone camera only as your backup camera.Although my list of cons seem long, I still give this phone 4 to 4.5 STARS.  It's quite a user friendly utilitarian DUAL SIM phone with a very responsive capacitive touch screen - great for calls, texts and managing two phone numbers on one handset.Hope my review was helpful ... Jeffrey A. (Jeff)

Reviews.Title: nice phone but a  little complex and came from Europe!
Reviews.Author: Kelly A. Crout "MMS Photography"
Reviews.Content: The phone is great for the price however when I received it the charger was European....must of missed that in the description!The touch is very sensitive so be careful when scrolling for a number early morning or you will end up calling your boss like I did.  I love the concept of the dual sim since I have a business but there is a hold button at the bottom of the touch and my chin keeps hitting it while I talk....have not found a way to disable it. The other con is when you receive a phone call if you do not answer on the first or second ring the touch screen almost shuts down and you cannot answer it....might be just operator error?  overall despite the cons it is a decent phone for the price....have not used the dual sim yet so cannot comment on that.

Reviews.Title: like this phone a lot
Reviews.Author: Cindy N
Reviews.Content: Got for my husband who has large fingers and just needed a phone he can dial-he doesn't email or text so the phone is good for him.  Right size for his hand and works on our carrier.  It is 2G so we can't get the internet up and running on our network, but he will never use it anyway.  It is easy to use and that's a plus-video, phone, voice record and texting all simple.  This is a good first "smartphone" if internet is not your biggest priority.

Reviews.Title: nice thin phone!
Reviews.Author: CyberGypsy "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: A great little phone for your everyday needs, great reception AT&T; , and very clear calls, I had many phones and this one is a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Lornapone
Reviews.Content: Fulfills the functions however the camera takes crappy pictures and I would have preferred if it could be locked and the screen was a bit bigger.It is very easy to use, connects quickly to the net, multitasks and has many useful applications.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: nickey
Reviews.Content: THE ONLY THING I HAD TO ENTER MY SIMPLE MOBILE PASS CODE MANUALLY TO PICK UP THE INTERNET WHEN I CANT PICK UP WIFI.BUT THE MOMENT I DID IT HAS BEEN WORKING GREAT! GREAT PRICE FOR  NICE LIL SMAR PHONE!!

Reviews.Title: Very 2009
Reviews.Author: D. Harrod "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: The phone was nice and small but mine was not unlocked so it was returned. Thanks Amazon for an easy return!This is not a smart phone by any means. Keyboard is T9 so you will take a very long time typing text messages and emails.

Reviews.Title: kelly  Barbados
Reviews.Author: kelvin
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a duel sim phone and saw this LG ,  I ordered it . A very neat phone , work  no complain  I love it . it working well in Barbados . Shipping time was excellent. thank you.

Reviews.Title: LG T375 GREAT BASIC PHONE.
Reviews.Author: Dennis R.
Reviews.Content: This cell phone for what it cost, works just great.  Dual sim, I got it just to text and get text from my gf in the Philippines.  And I can also with the use of At&T; Go Phone Sim I can call unlimited here in the States locally and long distance if I want.  And also keep in touch with my gf.  I love this dual sim phone.  It does what supposed too.  For the money, you cannot beat this phone.  And its nice that's its unlocked also.That way you can use any sim you want too in it.  Easy to text, and calling is also easy.  Toushscreen is so nice.  Great little cell phone.DennisImperial Beach, Ca

Reviews.Title: Dual
Reviews.Author: AndrewL
Reviews.Content: Two chips one phone, one chip for home and one chip for away! Simple to use,,,gave it to a family member

Reviews.Title: Not what it says!
Reviews.Author: Byron Alarcon
Reviews.Content: This phone is not what is describe it! I put a sim card on it witch it has data and all that but this phone doesn't has access to the web!

Reviews.Title: locked cell phone
Reviews.Author: REGIANE RADECKI
Reviews.Content: my cell phone is locked /Telstra Australia wainting for a unlocked code and procedure. I can't to use in Brasil

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Mahbubul Maruf "nycsmaruf"
Reviews.Content: does not workit looks all fineafter 3 days of use, it drops calls and the other person in the other line can hear but you cannot hear anythingDO NOT BUY THIS. I CONTACTED THE SELLER, NO HELP... IF YOU CHECK ALL OF MY RATINGS AND STFF, I AM VERY LIBERAL ABOUT MY REVIEWS BUT THIS WAS THE WORST EXPERIENCE I HAVE HAD.

Reviews.Title: not that attractive, and hard to figure out.
Reviews.Author: Moogig
Reviews.Content: it is okay phone for maybe elementary school kids or older people.  I spent an entire day to figure it out. No longer using it due to its embarrassing ring tone, and toy like features.

Reviews.Title: hello urgent please i need the track number please urgent
Reviews.Author: gustavo toledo
Reviews.Content: heyyyy you dude i need  the track number please sent it to me again please!!! i need the track number urgent pleaseeee

Reviews.Title: a very good deal for this price
Reviews.Author: WASER YISRO
Reviews.Content: the phone surface and features are fine. but it lacks a multi-task key, and acceleration sensor. also, when talking via Bluetooth, sometimes the sound isn't clear. otherwise a very good phone.one bold pro is the high responsibility touch screen that gives a very nice experience when typing!

Reviews.Title: Back to basics!
Reviews.Author: Shemoth
Reviews.Content: I was sick & tired of my samsung galaxy due to it's low battery life & having to restart the phone eact time it hangs.I needed a phone dedicated to make & receive calls, unfortunately in the US most phones come with contract and pre-built for a particular provider.Initially I was sceptical if this would work well as it's from middle east(they've sent me a us plug adapter free).The phone arrived on time & customer service was prompt.LG phones are known for the battery life & this one has excellent battery, I charge it every 2 days!The build is simple and can be slipped into the pocket.Excellent sound clarity.Another great feature is that it has inbuilt call recording(i've tried every single android app-none of them worked properly)User interface is great, no-nonsense..simple.This comes with a 2mp camera, really dosen't bother me.I'm using this phone with T-mobile and I have unlimited calls & text!For my android needs I use my tablet.

Reviews.Title: It's not functional
Reviews.Author: Frank Vilda
Reviews.Content: This phone have serious problem with MMS and Data Configuration. You can only access the internet when you are connected in a Wifi Network. I put 2 Simcards, one from T-Mobile and the other from Solavei and i don't have any Data Traffic. So... i remove the Data plan on my account and that it's the line that i have for my son without Data, only call, answer calls and plain text messages (No MMS)

Reviews.Title: Very fast shipping on the product
Reviews.Author: shopeternity
Reviews.Content: The shipping was very fast.  Will try the new phone out to see how it is.  didn't realize how small a 3.2 inch is for a phone.

Reviews.Title: kind of flimsy
Reviews.Author: Mia
Reviews.Content: This phone is smaller than I expected and feels cheap.  For the price I didn't really expect too much more.

Reviews.Title: Boss phone
Reviews.Author: Dj Defprince "Defprince!"
Reviews.Content: Plain talk, bad manners, this is the best phone I ever bought, and yes I once had a blackberry, and still it is the best!!! LG thought about everything in the design of this phone...you name it , it can do it.

Reviews.Title: Its Alright
Reviews.Author: Bluestar lover
Reviews.Content: This phone was great until a few months after I had it. The screen locked up and I cannot use it

Reviews.Title: Excellent price/performance cell phone.
Reviews.Author: edwingon
Reviews.Content: Excellent price/performance cell phone. Very good workmanship. Dual sim feature works very well and is very easy to use. For an entry level smart phone it’s a winner. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: great looking phone
Reviews.Author: GUY "GM"
Reviews.Content: This phone look great externally and for the shape but the memory and performance is a little small when browsing.LG T375-BLK Cookie Smart Dual Sim Unlocked Phone with 3.2-Inch Touchscreen and 240 x 380 Pixels Screen Resolution - No Warranty - Black

Reviews.Title: i bough two LG T375 one working ok the other shut down and never came back on just after two weeks.
Reviews.Author: Steve Rampersad
Reviews.Content: i bough two LG T375 one working ok the other shut down and never came back on just after two weeks.

Reviews.Title: I went back In time with this phone.
Reviews.Author: Jennel Brooks
Reviews.Content: It has the old school text format where you have to push several buttons just to write one word. I wish I knew this before I purchased it. The phone is really simple. If that's what your looking for then this may be perfect. I'm currently waiting in a replacement Android in the mail. This phone is not for me, but may be great for someone else.

Reviews.Title: Not for me darn it.
Reviews.Author: none
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and one was sent back immediately because it wasn't what my son wanted or needed and the other got sent back shortly after.  No fault of the phone or the seller, T-Mobile didn't get their info correct and said we'd have great service when in fact we didn't have any!  Seller was most helpful but even they can't make a phone work without service.

Reviews.Title: LG Phone
Reviews.Author: Dawn Maltba
Reviews.Content: The LG T375 Cookie Smart Dual Sim Unlocked Phone with 3.2-Inch Touchsceen had to be returned because of dual sim - other than that it would have  been my perfect phone!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone!
Reviews.Author: SODAK
Reviews.Content: The unique problem is that the phone doesnt have spanish available. The rest of the phones is very fine! Thanks

Reviews.Title: it is a fake phone
Reviews.Author: nebyat
Reviews.Content: I really hate it is is like kids phone and i think you got be kidding for selling this phone stop selling this phone its a trash doesnt got with what the sellers have said and expectation don't waste your money and time

Reviews.Title: sin idioma español
Reviews.Author: jose soto
Reviews.Content: no tiene idioma en español, y no lo avisan en la publicidad, aunque llego a tiempo, el telefono es bueno
